body_html:
Hi, the only examples for using the DistributionStrategy directly with low level APIs are in some of the unit tests.
For e.g https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/python/minimize_loss_test.py#L103

Which particular strategy are you interested in using? Some are more straightforward to use directly than others.

body:
Hi, the only examples for using the DistributionStrategy directly with low level APIs are in some of the unit tests. 
For e.g https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/python/minimize_loss_test.py#L103

Which particular strategy are you interested in using? Some are more straightforward to use directly than others.
